content.prompt: Which of the following statements most accurately describes the error performed in the cadence that begins in measure 3 ?

choices.label: The 64 chord on beat 2 has an incorrect doubling.
The soprano and alto notes of the 64 chord do not resolve correctly to the â…¤ chord.
To follow the cadential formula correctly, the 64 chord should have been placed on the first beat of measure 3.
The bass note of the 64 chord does not resolve correctly on the third beat of measure 3.

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
